i absoloutely have a love hate relationship with this game
i hate this game so much , alot of hackers and BS kills but for some reason i keep coming back to it
you never get what you want from a crate but hey what game with crates do you get what you want 
i bought it back when it was a 15 dollar game and was kinda salty when they made it free but hey if you want a game that you will wish you never installed and at the same time always come back for more this is definitely the game for you
i will say you will scream, feel like throwing your keyboard and mouse at a wall, feel like punching your moniter (which i strongly suggest against)  but overall this game is pretty damn fun on offical servers and the community servers are HELLA TOXIC but trust me this game is definitely one to play given it is free now.
The surf servers are the only thing I enjoy tbh
